description: The Google Pixel 10 price in India is set at Rs. 79,999, marking the entry point for the new Pixels this year. Despite massive upgrades like a dedicated telephoto camera along with new AI features onboard, the Pixel 10 manages to match Pixel 9 pricing at launch, which is a good thing. Yes, there are some downsides, such as an underwhelming processor, which can be frustrating when trying to game on the device. But if you're someone who doesn't game at all, then the Pixel 10 shouldn't disappoint you. Read our full review here.
title: Google Pixel 10 Review: A Brilliant Phone We Wanted to Love

description: Sony is reportedly planning to host a State of Play livestream next week. The PlayStation parent hasn't hosted a general State of Play show since June, where it revealed Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls. Insomniac Games could share a new trailer for Marvel's Wolverine at the next State of Play.
title: Sony Said to Be Planning State of Play Broadcast for Next Week

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 kicks off on September 23, promising major discounts across categories including smartphones, laptops, smart TVs, wearables, and speakers. Billed as the company’s biggest annual event in India, the sale will run for an indefinite period. Notably, deals on Amazon’s Echo devices are already live, giving buyers an early chance to grab smart home products.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Early Deals on Amazon Echo Devices Revealed

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival starts on September 23 in India, with Prime members getting 24-hour early access. The sale will feature major discounts, exchange deals, and special offers across categories. Shoppers using SBI debit and credit cards can get a 10 percent instant discount, along with extra benefits on EMI transactions. Additional savings can be availed through coupons and exchange offers, lowering the effective price further during the festival. Here we have a list of the best early deals on smart TVs from top brands.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Early Deals on Smart TVs from Sony, Samsung, TCL and More Revealed

description: France is warning it may block cryptocurrency firms licensed in other EU countries from operating locally, citing concerns about gaps in enforcement under the new MiCA framework. The French financial watchdog argues that some firms are exploiting looser jurisdictions, and together with Italy and Austria, is calling for ESMA to oversee major crypto companies directly. The move could challenge the EU’s “passporting” mechanism and reshape the bloc’s crypto regulatory landscape.
title: France Could Block Crypto Firms With MiCA Licenses Due to Enforcement Gap Concerns

description: Honor X5c Plus 4G will launch in a 4GB + 128GB variant according to a tipster. A new leak suggests that it will sport a flat 6.74-inch HD+ LCD screen, a MediaTek Helio G81 SoC and Android 15-based MagicOS 9.0. The pricing of the handset has also been leaked. It is said to feature a 5,260mAh battery with 10W charging, a 50 megapixel dual rear camera setup, a 5 megapixel selfie shooter and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.
title: Honor X5c Plus 4G Price, Design, Colour Options, Key Features Leaked Ahead of Launch

description: Oppo Find X9 series will launch in October in China. Ahead of the launch, Oppo has revealed the chipset and AnTuTu score of the Find X9 Pro model. The Oppo  Find X9 Pro has also turned up on the Geekbench website with the model number PJD110. Both models are expected to feature OLED displays made by Tianma.
title: Oppo Find X9 Pro With Dimensity 9500 SoC Scores 4 Million Points on AnTuTu; Spotted on Geekbench

description: Amazon is providing Early Deals on several smartphones ahead of the Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025. The discount sale brings a wide range of products at lower prices. The Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 will begin on September 23. Prime Members will get early access to the sale.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Check Out These Early Deals on Mobile Phones

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 will kick off soon. A week before the upcoming sale event’s commencement, the company has revealed early deals on various electronics such as phones, smartwatches, washing machines, refrigerators, smart home appliances, PCs, laptops, and true wireless stereo (TWS). During the sale event, the company will offer gaming, professional, and everyday-use laptops at a discounted price.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Early Deals on Laptops From Apple, HP, Acer, and More

description: The Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale kicks off on September 23. During the sale event, customers can purchase a wide range of products across categories with lucrative discounts. From gaming consoles like the Sony PlayStation 5 Slim to accessories such as the PowerA Battle Dragon Wireless Controller, the upcoming sale will bring exciting deals for gamers. This article will highlight some of the top deals available on gaming consoles and accessories during the Amazon sale.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Early Deals on PlayStation 5 and Accessories Revealed

description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has sold 4.4 million copies, Sandfall Interactive staff members said in a recent interview. The RPG hit 3.3 million unit sales towards the end of May. Expiedition 33 launched on April 24 on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series S/X.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Has Sold 4.4 Million Copies in Less Than Six Months of Launch

description: Xiaomi 17 series leaks have been surfacing online for a while, suggesting the specifications and features that the upcoming lineup could offer. Now, a tipster has shared an alleged render of the Xiaomi 17 Pro, revealing the design of the smartphone. This is not the first time that a render of one of the phones in the lineup has appeared online. The Chinese smartphone maker has recently teased the design of the Xiaomi 17 lineup, showing a phone with a secondary display on the back.
title: Xiaomi 17 Pro Design Render Gives Us a Good Look at Its Leica-Branded Rear Cameras, Secondary Display

description: American Express has rolled out NFT passport stamps for US cardholders, stored on Ethereum’s Base network. The digital stamps can be customised to highlight travel experiences like meals, hotels, or monuments. This initiative modernises the fading tradition of passport stamps and aligns Amex with global brands experimenting with NFTs, including Lufthansa, Mastercard, and Starbucks.
title: American Express Launches NFT Passport Stamps to Commemorate Travel Memories

description: Ghaati showcases Anushka Shetty in thrilling action-crime mode under Krish Jagarlamudi’s direction. Set in the rugged Eastern Ghats, it tells of a marginalized community’s fight back against exploitation and criminal syndicates. Released 5 September 2025, it’s praised for performances and setting, though the latter half’s narrative earns mixed feedback.
title: Ghaati OTT Release Reportedly Revealed Online: When and Where to Watch Anushka Shetty-Starrer Movie Online?

description: Gemini’s Nano Banana trend has gone viral on social media, surpassing 500 million image generations. The custom AI model lets users upload images and apply detailed edits with prompts. While popular, it has reignited privacy concerns, as Google stores all user conversations and uploaded images, which can be used to train its AI systems and services.
title: Google's Viral Gemini Banana Trend is Fun, But It Comes With a Privacy Risk

description: Dakota Johnson, Pedro Pascal, and Chris Evans headline Materialists, a glamorous romantic drama by Celine Song. The film, set in New York’s luxury dating world, dives into the conflict between love and wealth. Now streaming on top OTT platforms, it’s a must-watch for fans of romance and stylish storytelling.
title: Materialists Now Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know About Dakota Johnson’s Starrer Movie

description: The Trial Season 2 is soon landing on your digital screens. It features Kajol in the lead role. This season will follow Noyonika SenGupta battling with her professional and personal life altogether.
title: The Trial Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Kajol’s Legal Drama Series Online

description: The Huawei Watch GT 6 and GT 6 Pro will go official on September 19. Ahead of their debut, renders, price, and specifications of both models have surfaced. As per a report, the standard Watch GT 6 will be available in two sizzes, while the Pro model may have a single variant. Both smartwatches will have 466 x 466 pixels AMOLED screens and 64GB on onboard storage.
title: Huawei Watch GT 6, GT 6 Pro Price, Specifications Leak Ahead of September 19 Launch: Report

description: iPhone 17 Pro Max in Cosmic Orange has reportedly seen strong demand, with in-store pickup reservations selling out within three days in the US and India. An Apple specialist is said to have confirmed all storage variants in the colourway are out of stock, though Deep Blue remain available in select stores, with restocks planned. Apple India’s website shows the entire Pro Max lineup unavailable for in-store pre-orders, and the Cosmic Orange option is unavailable from both Pro and Pro Max listings.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Max in Cosmic Orange Colourway Reportedly Out of Stock in the US, India

description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 FE has been launched in India and comes with a starting price of Rs. 59,999. In this price segment, the smartphone will compete with the Apple iPhone 16e, which is also priced similarly. Check out the comparison of Samsung Galaxy S25 FE and Apple iPhone 16e to know which one is a better option to buy in this price segment.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE vs Apple iPhone 16e: Price in India, Features and Specifications Compared

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 and Galaxy Tab A11+ are said to be in the works. Ahead of the formal launch, alleged marketing images of the upcoming tablets have surfaced on the Web. The renders show them in two colour options. The Galaxy Tab A11 is said to feature a MediaTek Helio G99 chipset. The Galaxy Tab A11+ could run on MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11, Galaxy Tab A11+ Leaked Renders Hint at Design, Specifications

description: Apple has released iOS 26, iPadOS 26, watchOS 26, macOS Tahoe, and visionOS 26, introducing new features, design updates, and expanded Apple Intelligence tools. Key additions include Live Translation for real-time conversations across apps and AirPods, upgrades to Visual Intelligence with ChatGPT support, custom Genmoji creation, new art styles in Image Playground, and Workout Buddy for personalised fitness motivation.
title: Apple Adds New and Upgraded Apple Intelligence Features for iPhone, iPad and Mac Devices

description: Bitcoin traded at $115,800 (roughly Rs. 1.01 crore), consolidating as traders await the US Fed’s policy decision. Ethereum slipped to $4,500 (roughly Rs. 3.9 lakh), while Solana and Dogecoin saw sharp declines. Analysts cite strong ETF inflows and whale accumulation as key supports, but caution that momentum depends on Fed guidance.
title: Bitcoin Holds Near $115,800 as Altcoins Face Selling Pressure

description: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025 is set to commence on September 23. A week before the beginning of the sale event, the e-commerce platform has announced the discounts on several Poco handsets. The list of Poco phones that will be available during the upcoming sale includes the Poco F7 5G, Poco X7 Pro 5G, and Poco M7 series. Flipkart Plus and Black subscribers will get early access to the deals.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale: Poco F7 5G Price to Drop Under Rs. 30,000, Discounts on Poco X7, M7 Series Revealed

description: MediaTek, a leading chipmaker, has finished designing and testing its flagship chip on TSMC’s cutting-edge 2nm process, making it one of the first companies to adopt this advanced technology. Mass production is slated for the end of next year. The company also revealed that its next-generation Dimensity flagship SoC, likely the Dimensity 9500, is set to launch on September 22.
title: MediaTek Dimensity 9500 Launch Date Announced; Company Designs Its First Chip Using TSMC’s 2nm Process

description: The Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G arrives as a durable handset that aims to address consumer concerns about smartphone fragility. It features a tough build and a long-lasting battery. However, the Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G is placed in a highly competitive price bracket where durability alone isn’t enough to impress. But does the handset prove to be more than a mere phone that can survive it all? Read on to find out in our Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G review.
title: Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G Review: Is a Great Design Worth the High Price?

description: Vivo V60e 5G is likely to launch soon, and alleged renders, pricing and specifications of the phone have leaked online. It is tipped to come in two colour options with a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset under the hood. It could feature a 6,500mAh battery with 90W fast charging. It is said to come with an IP68 + IP69 rating for dust and water resistance.
title: Vivo V60e 5G Design, Price in India Leaked; Said to Feature 6,500mAh Battery, Dimensity 7300 SoC

description: Apple first unveiled the watchOS 26, along with iOS 26, earlier this year in June during its Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025. Now, the company has rolled out the new watchOS 26 globally, including in India, for its smartwatches. The new software update brings a new suite of features, like Hypertension Notifications, Workout Buddy, Live Translations, and redesigned Smart Stacks, along with the Liquid Glass design.
title: watchOS 26 Rolled Out With Workout Buddy, Hypertension Notifications and Liquid Glass Design

description: In a discussion with the press, Google said that India is among the leading countries in terms of Gemini’s Nano Banana usage. The feature, which first arrived at the end of August, has become immensely popular among Indian users, who have been using it to create multiple trends on social media. The AI model is known for its effectiveness in retaining character consistency while editing elements.
title: Google Says India Is Leading the Nano Banana Trend; Shares Tips on How You Can Start the Next One

description: Rockstar Games expects Grand Theft Auto 6 to be the largest game launch in history. The studio said so in a job listing on its website, before deleting the GTA 6 mention. Grand Theft Auto 6 was announced in December 2023, aiming to launch in 2025. The game has been delayed to May 2026.
title: GTA 6 Will Be the 'Largest Game Launch in History', Says Rockstar Games

description: Spotify has announced a new experience for free users. It has lifted some of the previous restrictions, and listeners can now play any song that appears on their home page. They can also search for tracks and play them directly, without having to shuffle through a random playlist. Apart from this, the music streaming platform also announced the ability to create custom covers for playlists.
title: Spotify Free Users in India Can Finally Search and Play Any Track, Design Playlist Covers, and More

description: Vivo X300 allegedly appeared on the Geekbench benchmarking site. This handset is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset. The Geekbench listing suggests that the purported phone will run on Android 16 and will be equipped with 15GB of RAM. It is expected to be released in China in October alongside the Vivo X300 Pro.
title: Vivo X300 Global Variant Visits Geekbench With MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC

description: Xiaomi 17 series will comprise the Xiaomi 17, 17 Pro, and 17 Pro Max. The 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max feature a “Magic Back Screen” integrated into the rear camera island. All three models will be the first phones with Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. Leaks suggest the 17 Pro will have a 6.3-inch LTPO display with 120Hz refresh, triple 50-megapixel rear cameras, IP69 dust and water resistance, an ultrasonic in-display fingerprint sensor, and a 6,300mAh battery with 100W wired and wireless charging support.
title: Xiaomi 17 Pro Series Confirmed to Feature Rear Display, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC

description: UK-based consumer tech brand Nothing has raised $200 million (about Rs. 1,760 crore) in its Series C round, led by Tiger Global and others, bringing total funding to $450 million. The company said it plans to launch multiple AI-powered devices next year, hinting that these products will complement its smartphones rather than compete with them.
title: Nothing Raises $200 Million in Series C Funding, Plans to Launch AI-Focused Devices

description: Apple is rolling out AirPods firmware version 8A356 alongside iOS 26, bringing up to seven new features, including sleep detection pause, battery alerts, and CarPlay automatic switching. Users of AirPods Pro 2, AirPods 4, or the latest AirPods Pro 3 gain additional features like beta Live Translation, enhanced recording, Camera Remote control, and clearer call audio. Notably, the Cupertino-based tech giant started rolling out the iOS 26 update for iPhone on Monday.
title: Apple's AirPods Pro 3, Pro 2, and AirPods 4 Get Firmware Update With New iOS 26 Features

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series is anticipated to be announced early next year. While the company has not yet confirmed the existence of the next Galaxy S lineup, a new report has suggested the chipset of the new series. It is said to come with an Exynos 2600 chipset. The Galaxy S26 Ultra variant could come with Qualcomm's next-generation flagship chipset.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series to Launch With In-House 2nm Exynos 2600 Chipset: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 series was launched earlier this year in January. The South Korean tech giant’s current flagship is the Galaxy S25 Ultra. Now, its possible successor has been spotted on a certification website in China, along with the rumoured Galaxy S26 Pro and the standard Galaxy S26. The listings reveal the charging speed of the three phones.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra, Galaxy S26 Pro Charging Speed Listed on Certification Website

description: After months of anticipation, Apple has finally released the iOS 26 update for iPhone. It brings a new design language called Liquid Glass, which is implemented across the UI. Apps such as Photos and Phone have been revamped to deliver more on the productivity front, while there are some new ones as well, such as Apple Games. Apple has also expanded its AI suite with several new features.
title: iOS 26 Is Now Available, Here’s What’s New for iPhone

description: Meta has long been rumoured to introduce a pair of smart glasses with a built-in display. A video accidentally posted on the company’s official YouTube channel confirms its existence. Dubbed Meta Ray-Ban Display, the smart glasses appear with a heads-up display and an sEMG Wristband, enabling gesture support. The video also provides a first look at the rumoured Oakley Meta Sphaera.
title: Meta Ray-Ban Display With Heads-Up Display and sEMG Wristband Leaked Ahead of Meta Connect 2025

description: Google’s Gemini Nano Banana, also known as Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, is fuelling new AI image trends online. The custom model supports inline image editing with improved character consistency, enabling viral creations like 3D figurine avatars and cinematic red saree portraits. Available to all Gemini users, it lets people transform or blend images with simple prompts.
title: How to Join the Viral Nano Banana and Saree Trend: The Gemini Prompts You Need

description: The Witcher Season 4 is set to land on the digital screens. This season, Liam Hemsworth replaces Henry Cavil and joins in as Geralt. Watch on Netflix, from Oct. 30th, 2025.
title: The Witcher Season 4 Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch It Online

description: There are numerous options to consider when shopping for a new smartphone under Rs. 25,000 in India. Brands such as Motorola, Nothing, Oppo, and OnePlus offer compelling packages with good specifications and software support. To help you make an informed decision, we have compiled a list of the best smartphones in India in this price bracket.
title: Top Smartphones Under Rs 25,000 in India (September 2025): OnePlus Nord CE 5 5G, Realme P4 Pro 5G, Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G
